info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:20AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, western Warren and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 420 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wells, or 12 miles south of Speculator, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Corinth, Johnsburg, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Day Center, Moffitt Beach Campground, Lake Luzerne Campground, Chestertown, Sacandaga Campground, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Thurman, Stony Creek, Harrisburg, Hope, Arietta, Benson, Thurman Station and Sodom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for eastern New York.
